language.description: Set the bot language for this server

The bot language for this server has been set to **{language}**

**Note:** Slash commands will still display in your Discord language, but responses will use the set language.

prefix.description: Set a custom command prefix for this server

**Old Prefix:** `{old}`
**New Prefix:** `{new}`

You can now use prefix commands with `{new}`
Example: `{new}help`, `{new}ping`
